sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-player(tabindex="-1")
	#player(tabindex="-1")
</template>

<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { loadYouTubeAPI } from '../utility/youtube'
import { useSettingStore } from '../store/settings'

export default {
	name: 'YoutubeVideo',
	data() {
		return {
			player: null
		}
	},
	computed: {
		...mapState(useSettingStore, ['autopause'])
	},
	props: {
		playerOptions: {
			type: Object,
			default: () => { }
		},
		videoId: {
			type: String,
			default: '7aMOurgDB-o'
		}
	},
	mounted() {
		this.loadYoutubePlayer()
	},
	methods: {
		onYoutubeAPIReady() {
			const playerOptions = {
				height: '500px',
				width: '500px',
				videoId: this.videoId,
				playerVars: {
					'controls': 1,
					'rel': 0,
					'autoplay': this.autopause ? 0 : 1
				},
				events: {
					'onReady': this.onPlayerReady,
					'onStateChange': this.onPlayerStateChange
				}
			}

			this.player = new YT.Player('player', playerOptions)
		},
		onPlayerStateChange(event) {
				if (event.data === 0) {
					console.warn('Video Ended')
				}
		},
		onVideoIdChange() {
			this.loadYoutubePlayer()

		},
		loadYoutubePlayer() {
			loadYouTubeAPI()
			window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = () => {
				this.onYoutubeAPIReady()
			}
		}
	},
	watch: {
		player() {
			// Youtube gets rekted on hot reloads
			this.loadYoutubePlayer()
		},
		videoId() {
			this.onVideoIdChange()
		}
	}
}
</script>
<style scoped lang="scss">
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-player {
	@include flex-center();

	.info {
		@include flex-column();
		color: white;
	}
}
</style>
